channel.title: [pi]WildernessReLoaded Development Team
channel.description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello everyone, all information about this server u can find it my released version here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494813.0/topicseen.html I can host 24/7 server in 2-3 weeks but before that i need to complete this server
I want to add better curses, Fix combat, skills , summoning , and add same anims and gfx's and more
Requesting Coder's
[ul][li]Server sided coder 0/2 [OPEN],[OPEN] (coder who can add better skills not all but one of em is RC, coder who can fix weapon hits so they not gonna hit like 60s[/li] [li]Client sided 0/1 [open] (coder who can fix client bugs add custom anims,gfx's,npc's. Also have to be advenced[/li] [li]GFX Designer - 0/1 [open] [/li][/ul]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: [pi]WildernessReLoaded Development Team
item.dc:creator: @2bel 2bel
item.description:
@2bel wrote:

Hello my name is Kim
I want to be a server coder. Why? Simple, I have great experience and I have alot of knowledge. I’ve owned many servers before and helped many to reach their goal. Add: duykim123@live.no or skype: duykim1
I can fix skills and I can fix weapon hits (Easy)

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]WildernessReLoaded Development Team
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

Quote from: crazyfazespy on June 10, 2011, 08:41:59 AM 
    Server sided coder 0/2 [OPEN],[OPEN] (coder who can add better skills not all but one of em is RC, coder who can fix weapon hits so they not gonna hit like 60s

Changing items’ bonuses, is pretty simple. Pretty much your hits come out depending on the items bonuses, obviously. All you do is change them in Item.cfg (;


if u can change my weapons hits without str bonus changes then u can join item.cfg is easy lol but change weapon max hit without item.cfg changes is prety hard to do for my cuz have to read about 200 posts

Read full topic

[ul][li]Server sided coder 0/2 [OPEN],[OPEN] (coder who can add better skills not all but one of em is RC, coder who can fix weapon hits so they not gonna hit like 60s[/li][/ul]

Changing items’ bonuses, is pretty simple. Pretty much your hits come out depending on the items bonuses, obviously. All you do is change them in Item.cfg (;
